channel.title: Sharing Economy on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Sharing Economy on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Power Ledger (POWR) Logo Power Ledger (POWR) is a blockchain-based platform released in May 2016 with the goal of disrupting the global energy industry by enabling local areas to sell and distribute solar power to their neighbors without the help of middlemen. It is a technology company that uses blockchain to facilitate energy and environmental commodity trading. It is based in Australia and encourages dependable and affordable electricity. Power Ledger runs on the Ethereum network as a peer-to-peer energy exchange platform.
You can download thePower Ledgerlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Power Ledger
item.description: Power Ledger (POWR) is a blockchain-based platform released in May 2016 with the goal of disrupting the global energy industry by enabling local areas to sell and distribute solar power to their neighbors without the help of middlemen. It is a technology company that uses blockchain to facilitate energy and environmental commodity trading. It is based in Australia and encourages dependable and affordable electricity. Power Ledger runs on the Ethereum network as a peer-to-peer energy exchange platform.
